textBeforeTable: Information Call our office for more details. Special offers are available for language schools and EFL teachers.   English-Greek glossary available for free download on ORFEAS (http://orfeas.hau.gr) Complete transcripts Sample answer sheet Rating scales for the Writing and Speaking sections Introduction with a complete description of the revised examination Six complete practice tests in the format of the revised ALCE™ examination Contents Practice Tests for the ALCE™ Exam provides essential practice in all parts of the ALCE™ examination. The practice tests accurately reflect the level, format, and skills tested in the actual examination.
